data.eml:eml: Revision of the genus Pozziella (Porifera: Poecilosclerida) with description of three new species from the eastern Pacific *

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Díaz-Agras, Guillermo (2008): Revision of the genus Pozziella (Porifera: Poecilosclerida) with description of three new species from the eastern Pacific *. Zootaxa 1866: 69-94, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183749
